metadata.title: CVE-2017-8810 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3, and 1.29.x before 1.29.2,when a private wiki is configured, provides different error messages forfailed login attempts depending on whether the username exists, whichallows remote attackers to enumerate account names and conduct brute-forceattacks via a series of requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8810` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.4-1').
